item.Q:

item.A:
to tell; to inform; to say
报告 (報告) bàogào to inform; report; make known; speech; talk; lecture
zhōnglì neutral

traditional: 中立國

traditional: 兩立
liǎnglì coexistence
gōnglì public (e.g. school, hospital)
fēnlì separations

traditional: 國立
guólì national; state-run; public

traditional: 對立
duìlì oppose; set sth. against; be antagonistic to; antithetical; relative opposite; opposing; diametrical

traditional: 對立面
duìlìmiàn opposite
chénglì establish; set up

traditional: 立場
lìchǎng position; standpoint

lìfāngtǐ cube; cubic
lìzhèng to stand straight; attention! (order to troops)

traditional: 立法機關

traditional: 立體

zìlì self-help

traditional: 數目
shùmù amount; number

traditional: 本來面目
běnláimiànmù true colors; true features
mùqián at the present time; currently
mùdì purpose; aim; goal; target; objective
mùdìdì destination (location)
kēmù subject

traditional: 過目
guòmù to look over

traditional: 題目
tímù subject; title; topic
rénmíngōngshè people's commune
gōngshè commune

traditional: 通訊社
tōngxùnshè a news service (e.g. Xinhua)
bùhé not conform to; be unsuited to; be out of keeping with; should not; ought out
hézuò to cooperate; to collaborate; to work together; cooperation

hélì cooperate
hétong (business) contract

traditional: 合而為一

traditional: 合資

huíhé round

traditional: 場合
chǎnghé situation; occasion

traditional: 會合

zhònghé polymerrization

qīwàng hope; expectation

traditional: 無望
wúwàng against all odds
kànwàng (v) visit; pay a call to

traditional: 不怎麼
bùzěnma not very
bùzěnme not very; not particularly

traditional: 怎麼樣
zěnmeyàng how?; how about?; how was it?; how are things?

traditional: 怎麼著
zěnmezhe (pron) what; (idiom) "whatever", used to replace some verbs in a sentence to form a more general sentence

traditional: 否認

traditional: 認出

traditional: 認可

traditional: 認定

traditional: 認得

traditional: 認清

traditional: 認為

traditional: 認真

traditional: 認錯
rèncuò admit mistakes
